fields.name: Power Rating
fields.value:
• Each battle unit has a power rating depending on the unit’s rarity and level. The sum of power ratings of all units used is the power rating of an army.
• You can see a player’s current attack power (<:atkpower:849194035733069828>) and defense power (<:defpower:968339445512306748>) in the player’s profile page.
• The power rating doesn’t necessarily correlate to the strength of an army. In general, two armies with less than 300k power rating difference are considered even.

fields.name: Battlefield Effect
fields.value:
• A battlefield with 30+ level-9 troops has a non-decorated border effect (above).
• A battlefield with 30+ level-10 troops has a *decorated* border effect (below).
